## Task 1 - Basic Vector Practice
```{r}
#1
pretreatment <- c(130, 128, 116, 124, 133, 134, 118, 126, 114, 127, 141, 138, 128, 140, 137, 131, 120, 128, 139, 135)

posttreatment <- c(114, 98, 113, 99, 107, 116, 113, 111, 119, 117, 101, 119, 130, 122, 106, 106, 124, 102, 117, 113)

#2
names(pretreatment) = paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")
names(posttreatment) = paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")
pretreatment
posttreatment

#3
deltabloodpressure = c(pretreatment[1:20] - posttreatment[1:20])
deltabloodpressure

#4
mean(deltabloodpressure)

#5



```
